attributes.action: do all in his power to erect a staute of a sheep outside The Welsh Office, Cathays, Cardiff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recognition of the contribution of sheep to the agricultural sector of Welsh life, to Cymric identity and history, a bronze sheep seems to be an aposite way to record the contribution of sheep to our historic nation.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
